about_the_game:
The Artbook that records the production process of ISEKAI FRONTLINE.
and a digital album containing all CG and animation included in the game.
If you liked the game, please consider buying this!

-Digital album
You can easily access all the images and animations included in your game.

-Unpublished illustrations
Containing illustrations that could not be included in the game due to system limitations.

-Concept Art
Check out the character's design process and settings that couldn't be expressed in the game.

-Director's commentary
Let's look at the back settings of the characters.


Please note :
Contents included in the digital album can also be unlocked in the game.
The Artbook and digital album are downloaded to the folder where the game is installed, which can be accessed in :
-> Manage -> Browse local files

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content, Sexual assault/Non-consensual sex, Drug/alcohol abuse, Tentacle, Bondage play, and Violence.
All characters in-game are consenting adults.

name: ISEKAI FRONTLINE : Artbook + Digital Album

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy ISEKAI FRONTLINE : Artbook + Digital Album

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: The Artbook that records the production process of ISEKAI FRONTLINE, and a digital album containing all CG and animation included in the game. If you liked the game, please consider buying this!
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
